website_summaries.verdict: Microprocessor control doesn’t just charge batteries, it also analyzes and reconditions them to extend working life.
pros: Compact and easy to use – just attach it and forget it
Automatically switches to maintenance mode so will never overcharge
Shockproof and dust proof, with temperature sensor that compensates for environmental conditions
Fast, efficient charging for all vehicle battery types
cons: Occasionally indicates charge when battery is still flat

customer_reviews.title: Jay Leno recommended so...
customer_reviews.text: My Optima charger wouldn't completely charge my Optima battery so I did some research and found a video by Jay Leno recommending CTEK as the best. It completely charged the aging battery (don't buy one, see my review) in relatively few hours. It's now my new best battery friend. This charger is small, light, easy to use and comes with its own carry bag. You can mount in directly to your battery if you need to. There's no meter or screen to read but the manual explains exactly what's going on with each cycle-indicating led. Get one. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: GBeckwith

customer_reviews.title: RTFM before using this tender....
customer_reviews.text: The MXS 5.0 replaces the MUS 4.3 and is better in every way. Charges and reconditions automotive AGM batteries like a champ, overnight. Do not freak-out , if the charger feels quite hot to the touch - it can handle it! Just learn the correct sequence of actions first and foremost. Failure to do this and you will spark-out the unit and permanently hose your expensive new tender. Ask me how I know... lol. My Porsche dealership recommended this to me and I do not regret this purchase. Your battery gets a quality, full charge, best if the charger is directly connected to the battery posts themselves.... instead of distant jumper terminals in the engine bay. Get some...
customer_reviews.author: Velocipede

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are the proof
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are the proof. Notice the date on the battery. It takes 10-14 days for the last light on the charger to come on. READ THE MANUAL COMPLETELY!!. if you dont, you will think your charger doesn't work right. I have charged 4 other batteries with this charger. The one shown in the pics is my oldest one and most abused one. This charger works and does exactly what it claims. Pictures are the proof.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Avalino

customer_reviews.title: Glad I spent more
customer_reviews.text: I did plenty of research before deciding on a automotive battery charger. There is no doubt that Ctek makes some of the best and most advanced chargers. Got it today and it’s already hard at work recharging my battery after it was run dead. I prefer to buy some tools with the highest quality. Some things I skimp on. Something like this is worth spending a bit extra for too quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: noidontlikeit

customer_reviews.title: 110/120Vac ONLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: i have owned a CTEK charger in a previous life and have to concede that they are great battery chargers. So..i duly ordered from Amazon.com for delivery to Philippines. Shipped by DHL it was with me in 6 days..amazing. HOWEVER ... a truly terrible product description by Amazon meant I ordered a product suitable only for 110/120vac! NOWHERE in the description is this mentioned ... absolutely nowhere. Needless to say local voltage in Philippines is 220v .... so i now have a charger for which I need a step down transformer to use! ... I will therefore never use it. Unwilling to spend another $40 to return it ... therefore I will keep it for spare cables, bag etc.
customer_reviews.author: G. FLEMING

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a BMW and you drive very little and especially if you reside in a very cold climate... You need this baby! Don't fool around with all the other cheapo battery tenders. Bought this for my 550Ix.... works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great charger, not fast but done properly
customer_reviews.text: High tech charger, slowly brings battery to proper charge and can be left on for months without damage to battery. Will diagnose for a faulty battery and let you know to replace, has a recondition feature to try and restore a over discharged battery. Expect to leave on over night for a full charge. Not for quick charging of dead battery. Has led lights to let you know what stage of charging it is at and green to say good to go. If you have a AGM battery it is the charger to go to.
customer_reviews.author: Rwgems

customer_reviews.title: Product Made In CHINA
customer_reviews.text: I tried to find where this product was made but nowhere do they say Country of manufacture. When I received the product all you will find is PRC well if anyone out there like myself do not want to support CHINA it is made in Peoples Republic of CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Donjohn

customer_reviews.title: This is a BMW "must have" device!
customer_reviews.text: Using this on a 2012 BMW 650i and attached the included cable directly to the charging posts under the hood. The optional CTEK cigarette lighter adapter is NOT usable with this BMW as the interior outlet shuts off after 15 minutes. Works great and looking forward to AVOIDING costly BMW battery replacement.
customer_reviews.author: mambro

customer_reviews.title: BMW certified
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Since this is the only charger that I own, I don't know if this is better or worse than other chargers but it worked very well for my ~8 year old BMW battery. BMW sells a similar model with BMW's logo on it (see picture). In a sense, BMW-certified. Instruction is well written to let users know the potential risk of battery charging.
customer_reviews.author: Fine Woodworker

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has saved 2 batteries so far
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this maintenance charger to help with keeping my boat and rv batteries in top shape during the winter. So far I have tested on an AGM 100AH and a Interstate Deep Cycle, both have charged 100% and read full voltage output when connected to a volt meter. I definitely recommend this product, although for sake of convenience it would be nice to have a voltage reading on the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: BrycenMTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Help My BMW 335d Battery
customer_reviews.text: My BMW 335d battery was dead, and even though this went through all of the lights to indicate the process was complete after a day the car battery was still dead. AAA came and jump started it. I drove it 12 miles to the dealer to get a new battery installed and it had to be jumped again to start, so it might not have been the charger, just a completely broken battery. However, the lights on the charger indicated success, not failure. So it's probably a great charger, but didn't work in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I have a car that sits in our garage during bad weather which can be for weeks at a time. I do occasionally start it up to keep the lubricants flowing but that doesn't charge the battery. The CTEK handles that flawlessly. I just attach the cables to the jump start posts under the hood (the battery is in the trunk) and turn it on. It gets a little warm while charging but not enough to worry me. Once it charges the battery it monitors the charge and keeps the battery topped up as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Titan

customer_reviews.title: expensive and worth EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so very glad I ran across this product - accidentally while viewing Battery Tender accessories. This product compared to Battery Tender is like comparing a moped to a Harley. I bought the bumper and the 8ft extension cords. I bought a nice case for it too. (see my recent reviews) I tested it on a typical car battery and my lawn mower battery. It's FAST and informative. I like knowing what's going on and being confident of the results. (a mystery with Battery Tender products) I promise you'll love these CTEK products. The quality and engineering defines the word SUPERIOR.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff4U

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit - works just like Jay Leno said it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit - works just like Jay Leno said it would. The only improvement I'd like to see is an estimator of how much longer till it's completely finished with it's full reconditioning cycle. In one case, this entire process took 3 days. I suppose it just depends on your battery condition.
customer_reviews.author: aussie

customer_reviews.title: My second
customer_reviews.text: I had a neighbor tell me about this charger and how good it was. I did a little research and see that most of the major auto manufacturer's recommend it. I tried one and loved it so much I bought a second. The multi-step process of charging, re-conditioning, and maintaining any battery from those in my garden tractor and utility batteries to large auto batteries makes this small charger a one-stop solution. My first is attached to a vehicle I own that sits in cold storage all winter. It is connected to an AGM car battery and keeps it charged through the cold winter months. My second it for all of the other vehicle batteries I need to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Jack DTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Deltran Battery Tender
customer_reviews.text: Had a discharged car battery which this fully restored. My Deltran unit would indicate the batteries were fully charged and go into trickle mode after 30 minutes. Had motorcycle and car battery die when using Deltran. This charger slow charges batteries, taking at least 4 - 8 hours to fully run through all steps. Fully restored a discharged battery . Great charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Haas

customer_reviews.title: Get. This.
customer_reviews.text: My FJ cruiser has a dual battery optima setup and I was having charging issues big time. Spent over 400.00 on a new alternator and 200.00 for install and still issues. This charger did some magic and brought both batteries back from the dead. Mind blowing. Great xmas gift for anyone. Bargain price. Thrilled!!
customer_reviews.author: extremer

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hook up - BMW has battery in trunk, but charging posts are provided under the hood, so this was a snap. Let the engine cool completely to avoid melting the charger or wires on exhaust and cooling system components, ran a good heavy extension cord under the engine compartment, up to the charger which I placed near the charging posts, hooked it up as instructed (red first, black next), positioned the clamps horizontally so the hood didn't knock them loose when closed, plugged in the extension cord to the outlet, turned on the device and let it go. Battery was completely dead, so it took a few days to restore it, but everything is good now!
customer_reviews.author: Ma No

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: I have three cars and they sit for long periods without being driven. I have tried several chargers to maintain the batteries but wasn't happy until I got the CTEK charger. First I used a standard charger (2 or 10 amp charger) which was fast but wasn't very smart and had to be watched carefully to prevent over charge. Next I tried a trickle charger that worked but took a long time to do the job. Next I tried a solar 18watt charger but it also took a long time. Then I got the CTEK, it was fast, got my batteries in top condition and kept them that way. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Works on Odyssey PC925
customer_reviews.text: I have used this charger for my AGM battery (Odyssey PC925) and a "Maintenance Free" lead acid "regular" battery. Pleased with the results for both batteries. Plan on leaving this in place for over a week, and it will progress thru it's pre-programmed cycles and will fully charge a battery. I like the "plug it in and leave it" aspect of this charger. I also like the small size and the multiple ways you can connect the charger to the battery (clips or ring terminals, both fuse protected). Bottom Line: Recommend, and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W.

customer_reviews.title: Car Storage Necessity
customer_reviews.text: I have two cars that I drive minimally (335i and SQ5). As owners of these cars may know, the AGM batteries are expensive. If left for extended periods of sitting, the batteries will deplete as the electronics in the cars use energy during standby. Both start like a champ for the times I have taken them out. Also make sure you connect the tender to the battery posts under the hoods for these cars. Since the battery management system (BMS) monitors the batteries state of charge, you do not want to bypass this.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: CTEK 40-206 Verse 7002
customer_reviews.text: I have several CTEK 40 and CTEK 7002 The CTEK 40 is a ~4.0 Amp Charger 4 stars because of slower charging speed. The CTEK 7002 is a ~7.0 Amp Charger 5 stars because of the much faster charging speed For battery maintenance buy the CTEK 40 series For a dead battery or low battery and quicker charging times get the CTEK 7002... With the 7002 you are still looking at 8-10 hours to fully charge a healthy but dead pickup truck battery.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery tender/charger
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the factory provider battery tender made by Ctek for years. This new model with the AGM mode works better. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: tobewiser

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Best battery charger I've ever owned. Super pleased with this purchase; should have purchased long ago. I actually have two chargers, this one and a smaller tender (750mah) and they compliment one another depending on what I am doing or which car I'm working on. The various modes and selectable features is great. I use this thing way more than I anticipated. So far have used this on multiple Power Wheels batteries, Deja AGM batteries, regular car batteries...it works on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery charger!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm! I have a couple fair-weather cars that don't get much use during the winter. The batteries can run down and short trips around town are not enough to recharge the batteries, you have to get them out and drive them, which isn't always possible due to the weather. Also, my old battery charger was a hassle to use due to its age, size and weight. This is so much nicer and I am absolutely thrilled with it. I whole-heartedly recommend this for anyone who has cars or motorcycles they don't drive all the time but want to keep the batteries charged up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim from Oakdale

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around charger
customer_reviews.text: It just works. I had to spend some time wading through what models have what features. It seemed that this one did all I need.. Smaller ( motorcycle and tractor) size batteries Regular and AGM Normal and restore charging Top off I only had one battery that was an old sealed Audio deep cycle ( 15 year old Stinger) that hadn’t been charged for over 10 years that it couldn’t get going. Everything else in between it got through the whole cycle. Get this.
customer_reviews.author: stu

customer_reviews.title: High tech. Good results for me
customer_reviews.text: I had been a Battery Tender brand guy prior to this purchase I still like them fine. This CTEK unit is more high tech, for sure. It resurrected a battery that I thought was toast. I loaned to my neighbor who misunderstood that it was a short term loan. He put it on his vehicle&went to Arizona for the winter. It worked well in that role as all was good with his vehicle battery on his return. Not inexpensive but darn good unit.
customer_reviews.author: S4 Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Quality Charger
customer_reviews.text: Like many others I purchased this because I was not driving much during the pandemic and my battery was at risk. I started seeing the effects when my start/stop was no longer working. So far this has been a reliable charger and has served to keep the Start/Stop battery in my 2020 Volvo working. I highly recommend the 8.2ft extension cable and the wall bracket so you can easily mount the charger on the wall and plug in for maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Piper John

customer_reviews.title: No more battery warnings
customer_reviews.text: Have a BMW convertible that sits more than it's driven (my wife tried to talk me out of having it -- but on the good days it can go out -- they're phenomenal). Because it's not a daily driver (an ///M as a daily -- not the best idea) the battery needs a tender. This one is great. It keeps it topped off -- without the overcharge of the cheaper ones. Maybe I should get a new battery -- because when I let the car sit for a week without this -- the time/date is reset on the car.. When I take the time to hook this up --- that old battery still shows signs of life.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Good tender
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a Deltran Battery Tender Junior that the light stayed a reddish- green on. It still seemed to keep the battery charged & car started, but did not want to chance to malfunctioning & not knowing. Took some finagling to attach as the pigtail rings are very thin with large openings- have some washers on hand. 1st 3 lights lit up in ~ 10 min. Got to 7th light in a day or 2, took about 10d for 8th light to come on. Has more setting for AGM & reconditioning than Battery Tender. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Flores

customer_reviews.title: My winter and summer cars spend half a year plugged in, then start right up every time.
customer_reviews.text: I keep a winter car plugged in for 5 months, and a summer car for 7. When I return, they just start right up with no trouble at all and the batteries have lasted longer than usual. Great technology. Several luxury car makers sell their own chargers, which are just overpriced logo versions of the CTEK.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Cellini

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous overheated and burnt back side
customer_reviews.text: Had it connected to my classic car for 3 days with a near new battery and virtually no parasitic draw in other words it was not charging hardly anything probably less than 1/4 amp.. I got hot for some reason and burnt the plastic on the back lucky I had it on the concrete floor betides the car and not on the car cover or I would no longer have a workshop.. Be warned put it on a fire resistant surface.. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Precision

customer_reviews.title: Same as Porsche charger minus logo.
customer_reviews.text: This charger/tender works flawlessly. It is small an light. The cords are conveniently long and are good quality. The unit works perfectly on my car battery to maintain it during extended storage. Most relevant point: this is the exact same charger (minus the logo) that Porsche sells through dealers for about $200. If you buy this charger and also the cigarette lighter plug, you get the same as Porsche for about 40% less.
customer_reviews.author: LXXV

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep my Jaguar xk8 topped up in the garage when I'm not using it. I did purchase the optional cigarette lighter accessory but forgot that turns off after x mins in the car so that was a waste. This item works well. I know that some folks worried about it getting hot. Mine also got hot but that is while it was charging the battery from at least a 1/2 drained state. Once the batter was full the unit has been cold to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: GJW

customer_reviews.title: Seems to charge? Time will tell?
customer_reviews.text: I guess over time I'll evaluate the effectiveness of this particular battery maintainer. I have had several maintainers throughout the years and everyone hasn't given me much battery life after 3 years. I live in the Southwest and batteries are notorious for failing in the 3rd year of ownership due to dry and high heat of the Southwest. I will update later and see if the AGM battery on the BMW lasts over 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: nikboom

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger out there Period.
customer_reviews.text: Have had a CTEK 3300 for 5 years, works perfectly and has maintained my batteries in MB vehicles with out error. Bought this one for the recondition mode only to back up the other unit. Works better than the 3300, faster with recondition mode and runs much cooler. All 3 MB units are heavy on electronics and tough on batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Radio45

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Not much not to like other than the price and it takes a long time to fully charge your battery. Very easy to use. Connect it to your car battery and plug it into the outlet and that's it for most cars unless you have an agm battery. Took about 12-16 hrs to charge my Subaru from dead to full. Took 8 hrs to charge my bmw, wasn't dead but battery was low and I set it to recon. It's been 3 weeks since I charged my cars and they get driven once a week. They start up without any struggle since getting charged.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Chow

customer_reviews.title: Used for past 2 months, has maintained battery in winterized car
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use. Just connect and you're done. I'm maintaining a winterized vehicle and purchased this along with the CTEK extension cable and comfort connect cig lighter connector. It was as simple as connecting the three pieces together, plugging into the cig lighter and letting it do its thing. The LEDs are very helpful to let me know which stage in the charging/maintaining cycle the unit is in. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Installing this on seldom used truck to maintain batteries
customer_reviews.text: This is going on my sister's 2001 F250 Super Duty. The truck lives on a farm and isn't used on a regular basis. This should keep her batteries healthy. Using in conjunction with a battery cutout switch to combat parasitic draw issue. Also installing a bumper plug to attach power to this device. Reduces the possibility of driving off without unplugging and gutting the truck. :-)
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Restored an expensive Jag battery which I was sure was dead.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M.

customer_reviews.title: COVID have you not driving? This keeps your cars ready to go.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these now that I am driving less. One for my c7 Corvette that has a charging outlet in the trunk and one for my Honda Fit. The Fit I hardwired to the battery and no more dead battery in two weeks. (Common issue with Hondas that sit) On the Corvette I purchased an adapter and cable extension to reach the trunk. Again the car starts right up. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to install in my wife's VW bus, it makes it so easy to trickle or full charge, and the unit automatically works to maintain, prolong, and rejuvenate your vehicles battery. It has a compact design, and comes supplied with either temporary or permanent battery attachment cables. Not much else can be said, it does its job, and it does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Bluman

customer_reviews.title: I use this with my battery monitor
customer_reviews.text: This battery charger works like a charm. It does exactly what it says it does and does it well. The indicators are very helpful in knowing the status of your charge or when the battery is unsafe to recharge and use again. Combined with the battery monitor I use, I now have saved myself close to five hundred dollars on needing to purchase a new battery once a year for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Charges and maintains!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Porsche branded one for my 911, which is made by Ctek. My MR2 is having some draw, so I wanted something to keep my battery charged and this works well. At first when my battery was really drained, it was pretty warm. However, it does cool off when it's just maintaining the battery. Now my MR2 starts when I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: y2says

customer_reviews.title: Great for any BMW!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my BMW 335i to keep the battery healthy while it sits or when I need to code or work on it. Would 100% recommend this to anyone with a car with a ton of electronics, it will help extend your battery life by almost double from what I have heard
customer_reviews.author: frances e myers

customer_reviews.title: So far does not overcharge my battery
customer_reviews.text: A year ago I was out of country for two weeks and my car battery became too weak. The remote would not open the doors and when I started the car it groaned for a while before finally starting. So this year I was going to be gone for three weeks and decided to buy this Ctek battery tender. I tested it a few times overnight at home with no problem so before my trip I hooked it up and flew away. After coming back home I was worried that it might overcharge but I quickly unlocked my doors with my remote and then the car (BMW diesel) started immediately. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used this to hardwire a Mustang for winter storage. I pulled the battery first and put a multimeter on it. Then I let the charger so it's work on the battery out of the car so I could monitor it. It took half a day to recondition the battery and get it bulk charged. It's like a new battery now. It comes with clamps and eyelets so you can hardwire it if you choose which is what I plan to do. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Always Errors Out. Get a Battery Tender.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is useless I'll stick with the Battery Tender brand. This thing constantly errors out on batteries that are perfectly fine. When it errors out, it stops charging all together. My old beat up battery tender gets everything to float, including an old lawn mower battery that this couldn't, and they continue start every time like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not for DEAD batteries
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews I purchased this the CTEK MXS 5.0 charger only to find out after hooking it up to the dead battery in my RV, it went to energy saver mode. After repeated attempts, I started researching and found the answer buried on CTEK's website. In order for this charger to work your battery must have at least 2 volts charge left. Seriously? That should have been a warning notice on the product description at the least. It would have saved me from waiting a week to get it and then having to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: follow instructions by reading them
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2016 BMW 328i Xdrive that has an AGM battery and it was simple to setup to maintain my battery while I do not drive it as frequently as I would prefer. Reconditioning feature is awesome. Difference between this one and BMW brand is this one says CTEK not BMW which yields a considerable savings. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: HammerNNails

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical at the price, but it is worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these tell you what stage of charge they are in. One of my batteries failed charging and my old harley trickle chargers would have just kept trying to charge it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Overall great charger
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for months now. So far so good. Very simple operation. Works on all my batteries from small atv, truck, to deep cycle(small deep cycle). It does get fairly warm, as the instructions say, but not to the point of damage. The leads are very short and impossible to ground to the frame of a vehicle, barely enough to reach + - posts. Clips have cheap plastic covers that pop off, but can be reattached.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed and Feature Rich
customer_reviews.text: This charger does exactly what I need of it. Intuitive and easy to use. Great accessory package, jumper clamps a re handy and eyelet set of quick connects are smart; make sure you get a set for each battery you'll be maintaining. Given what I know about this charger I wouldn't hesitate to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Twisted Barbed Wire

customer_reviews.title: Proper ventilation while charging
customer_reviews.text: I just used my CTEK for the first time yesterday. So far it works great. The only comment I have is my 2 carbon monoxide detectors I have in my garage went off during the charging of my battery. I was unaware of that problem. I just opened the doors to clear the air. I just want to make everyone aware that you need proper ventilation when charging your batteries.
customer_reviews.author: wireman98

customer_reviews.title: Will probably extend the life of your car battery
customer_reviews.text: I only have empirical data on extending the life of the battery. It does go through a cycling mode and it seems to me that my car batteries last much longer than before. I have 2 Cteks and 5 cars. So it gets passed around to vehicles that lay dormant for the track.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chow

customer_reviews.title: Still working.
customer_reviews.text: I had a device very similar to this, and I expect manufactured by the same entity, that failed within a short period of time. So far this one is working as it should, maintaining a vehicle battery charge, while the vehicle is not being used on a regular basis. I hope it continues to be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoHiker

customer_reviews.title: CTEK 40-206 MXS 5.0
customer_reviews.text: Although it did not save the battery I had it certainly did charge it and improve the health of a greatly degraded car battery and bought me some time till I was able to get a replacement. Now it operates as a monthly regiment for keeping the new Battery healthy! So far so good great build quality ease of use and safety features make it practically fool proof to operate! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Luis R. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Works with AGM Batteries to Maintain and/or Recharge!  Same as Porsche Branded at Better Price!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with clamps and rings to connect to the battery. Also purchased the CTEK (56-263) cigarette lighter fitting to make connection easier. Using it to maintain battery and also have used it to maintain power during DIY 991 battery change. Also charged a dead, deep cycle trailer battery.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Good product but make sure you snap the insulators securely in place
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product. The battery of my car didn't have enough charge to start the engine. I connected this CTEK to the battery overnight and battery was able to start the engine. Now, I connected it to the battery all the time (because I only use the car once every 2 weeks or so). The only problem is the "insulators" that are in the claps are NOT snapped in place securely when I got the product. As a result, one of them was dropped into the engine bay after using the product several times. (See the picture with only one red insulator)
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I have several battery chargers. One has pretty blinking lights, but doesn't charge the battery ( I keep it in case my neighbor asks to borrow a charger). This one actually does exactly what the manufacturer claims it will do. I keep it on my 28 year old Nissan 300ZX, and it starts right up when I want to drive it. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel A. Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: THE charger to get!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing charger, with an effective repair mode. I've already revived two batteries that other chargers wouldn't charge. Make sure to purchase the rubber bumper. When looking for a new battery charger, CTEK was the only brand that didn't angry reviews accompanied by pictures of burned up chargers that self destructed. Take that for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this charger to replace one that did not work upon purchase. The replacement works perfectly well from the moment I plugged it in! I have another similar (older) CTEK product on another vehicle for many years that I have been very happy with. Thus, I was surprised when the last one did not work properly. Amazon replaced it at no charge and the replacement works very well! I am very happy with the whole process. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mistele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery maintainer
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. This is my second purchase of a CTEK maintainer. I use this one on an infrequently driven Corvette. Corvette's eat batteries if stored for long periods. This can get expensive because I use AGM batteries, which this maintainer supports. It keeps the battery topped up for when I want to drive it.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Small, robust design. Lots of features, well worth the cost over cheap knockoffs. I have replaced 2 cheaper models, one that may have over charged one of my batteries. Spend a little extra for quality.
customer_reviews.author: Denise & Jay Pistana

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for my AGM car batteries
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charger to maintain charges for the 4 cars we have. I recommend that you get the extension cord from CTEK to make connecting to batteries easier when you move car from car. This also serves as battery maintainer very well during winter months
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Took over night to fully charge the battery in my car.
customer_reviews.author: amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for me.....easy to attach to motorcycle battery without removing battery......keep things humming all winter....in the spring battery started motorcycle up just as you would expect. Nice when something simply works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: cbb

customer_reviews.title: Saved Me a Replacement Battery!
customer_reviews.text: I have had so many issues with my car in the past year, all of them basically around the battery / electrical for the car. Two battery replacements later...my battery died again! So I bought the CTEK charger. I took the battery out of my car, read the instructions and less than 24 hours later my car was back to life!!
customer_reviews.author: Real Boy

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for my BMW X3 battery
customer_reviews.text: My car battery was fully discharged. I used this charger over night and it was showing fully charged battery in the morning and had switched to trickle charging. Great product for keeping battery charged during long vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Alok

customer_reviews.title: Already saved 2 lawn mower battery
customer_reviews.text: We had a tractor battery that wouldn’t hold a charge and figured I’d give these a shot. My father had the same problem with his. Seems to have fixed both of them 👍 simple to use and works great. I also emailed support and got a very quick response within 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of them and both of them got delivered on time and are as described. I have been using them for few months now on multiple cars/motorcycles and they work great. Due to the fact that I have an extensive collection of vehicles, I am planning on purchasing couple more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Golebiowski

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second CTEK charger, first one just wore out after about 7 years of homeowner use. I use this to trickle charge my lawnmower battery off season. I just brought an Optima battery back FROM THE DEAD in a pickup truck which is an occasional use vehicle which was just off the road for a few months for repair. Beats buying a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and seller! The unit is easy to install, high quality and has features cheaper chargers/tenders lack. I have learned in the past that battery tenders do extend the life of a battery and this one is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: CTEK Makes The Best Battery Maintainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this CTEK 40-206 for my Alfa Romeo cause it’s the same one as the manufacturer sells at a much lower price. It works great comes with quick connects for both alligator clips & bolt on eye let’s. The owners manual is very easy to follow. Works great on my AGM battery. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: M Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: When you receive it, you'll know immediately. Even the box it comes in is quality. I use it on our garage queen, and it works perfectly. If it's good enough for Jay Leno, it's good enough for me...
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDonald

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Battery Tender
customer_reviews.text: The best. I’ve used cheap trickle chargers. They’ll do in a pinch but this sophisticated charger is much more than just a charger. It maintains a healthy battery. And it does it safely, day after day, month after month. Even Leno recommends it!
customer_reviews.author: PrintingAllNight

customer_reviews.title: Best automotive trickle charger out there
customer_reviews.text: A friend suggested the CTEK brand to me a few years ago. I now own four of these and use them to keep our car batteries fresh while we're on vacation and away from home. One of the important features is that, if your power goes out for a few minutes while you're away, the CTEK charger resets itself and resumes charging as if nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Craft

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Had a zero-turn battery that died after sitting out over the winter. This charger revived it just as expected. Really easy to use. Will connect it to maintain the battery during this coming winter.
customer_reviews.author: David Randall Buckingham

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to my portable solar panel set up to allow for shore power charging during times of little to no sun. The size of this battery charge allowed for easy placement on my charge controller panel. Keeps my AGM battries charged and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Keeping batteries healthy since I bought it. Rotate between several auto and lawn type batteries and works well on all so far. Plan to buy at least a couple more of these so can leave on a couple of low usage units full time.
customer_reviews.author: Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Excellent Value! Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived next day and was exactly as expected. Brand new, with carrying case and instruction booklet. Great value purchasing from Amazon. Product works fantastic. If you are looking for a smart car batter charger, this is the one to buy!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! For any special car that is isn't driven daily/weekly, this is the only way to go. I researched the dickens out of battery conditioners, and this is by far the best. No more "Please start engine, low battery".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm not driving too much because of the lock down so I bought this to keep the car battery charged. It's compact and easy to use. It can also be used for AGM and GEL batteries. This is a trickle charger not a jump starter but so far it hasn't let me down in the 4 months I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: slowerdelaware

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I have probably used this device more than 8 times to recharge my car battery so far. It does get warm but I leave it on the floor. Overall pretty satisfied with my purchase and cost saving of buying a new battery every few years.
customer_reviews.author: shigemi

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked terrific! I was able to recondition one battery in my 2011 Lincoln MKS that wouldn't hold a charge, now working fine for 6 months. Maintained my battery in my Mercedes SL550 during winter storage. Worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic cover in clamps came off, good charger though.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very good charger. my son and I use similar models. Both units have the same problems: the plastic covers on the clamps came off. I had to use some glues to fix them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I've ever had and now I'm selling my ...
customer_reviews.text: Best charger I've ever had and now I'm selling my huge shop charger since it overcharges and this doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Brian E.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the ‘68
customer_reviews.text: A must have for classic car owners/collectors. This and the comfort connector are should be your first purchase with any classic or collector car, right after obtaining Hagerty insurance. This CTEK charger keeps my ‘68 GTO ready to roll. Plugging the charger in doesn’t even require popping the hood once you route the comfort connector(sold separate) from the battery to the front grille. Thanks Jay Leno for the reference!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shahsiah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit upon recommendation from a friend who uses it for his race car that is kept stored. He hasn’t had to purchase a new battery for 3 years using this product, whereas before he was replacing the battery every year. I used the product to charge a newer battery in a car that had been sitting for a couple months. Placed the gator clips on the battery, plugged unit into the wall, and 24 hours later the car started up without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish the battery clamps had a longer lead cable....maybe three foot. This would be especially nice for those who have batteries in the trunk and use the jumper points under the hood for charging. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my old CTEK 3300
customer_reviews.text: My old 3300 was starting to give me problems so I decided to buy the latest. I used it this weekend on my wife's BMW 340i AGM, lawn tractor, 'Miata AGM and Aprilia Tuono AGM. Used the recon mode for the BMW and Miata. Worked very well. Buy the rubber protective cover to protect it, your vehicle and keep it from sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: Busa13

customer_reviews.title: Rock it
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market in the sub $100 category. If you're looking for a maintenance and restoration charger, this is the one to get. Brought a discharged battery into the big name auto parts store, they said it can't be charged. Did some research and picked up the CTEK MXS 5.0, overnight the battery was up and started the car immediately. Use it for maintaining new batteries now. Rock it.
customer_reviews.author: L. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!!!! WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got thes when my BMW X1 battery died when I started working from home. Did the research had Amazon send it. NOTE it is a trickle charger so it does take a while (I did mine during the night) the next morning the lights all followed correctly as in the steps and it cranked right up! Not a single problem or issue from using it either!
customer_reviews.author: keshia thornton

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product, but I was very disappointed to discover that it's made in China. The product literature does not disclose this fact. I was willing to pay extra for a non-Chinese product, but got fooled.
customer_reviews.author: bruce bigelow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This CTEK battery charger is easy to use. It does a great job keeping the batteries of my late model BMW's topped off as well as my 30 year old Jeep. The multiple indicator lights on the charger easily show the current state of the charge process.
customer_reviews.author: Al M

customer_reviews.title: Fully automatic.  Remembers battery type setting.
customer_reviews.text: Has up to 4.75 ampers of charge current. Settings for AGM or Lead Acid ,small and large batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for 2 years and am very pleased. But, should I need to replace them, I would consider the NOCO GENIUS1 battery tender which works just as well and is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my BMW needs, when is stored in garage for several weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product is well designed and very user friendly. The reason that I purchased this unit is that I have another more expensive Ctek unit and I am very pleased with that. I needed a less expensive quality maintainer for a new VW Tiguan I purchase that I only drive maybe 1 or twice a month. This keeps my battery charged and ready to go. Thank you Ctek for an outstanding products..
customer_reviews.author: pebjr

product_meta.title: CTEK 40-206 MXS 5.0-12 Volt Battery Charger
product_meta.description: The MXS 5.0 offers a unique eight step approach to battery care. Fully automatic microprocessor controlled charger with built-in automatic temperature sensor features a unique combination of advanced charging modes and makes the new MXS 5.0 the fastest, most effective and versatile consumer charger CTEK has ever made. The MXS 5.0 features capabilities for improved charging in all weather. It is the perfect charger for the user with multiple vehicle types and higher demand battery charging and maintenance requirements. Provides an outstanding charging experience!
feature_bullets: Unique reconditioning mode, built-in temperature sensing capabilities
Completely sealed Unit, spark proof and reverse - polarity protected
Premium input and output cable with robust strain relief
5 year warranty. Ideal for start-stop systems

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars598 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars

categories: Jump Starters, Battery Chargers & Portable Power
